channel.title: 317 pickup help **********$$****
channel.description: Ok so i want to make ::pickup so every1 can do but i want to make it so you cant spawn the items in the donator shop so how can i make it so you cant spawn certain ids with pickup?

item.title: 317 pickup help **********$$****
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Fox0wnage, post:4, topic:327888”] if(ItemID == *DonorItemID*){ deleteItem(*ItemID*) sM("You can't spawn this item"); }

The text between the two *'s are what can’t be spawned, and that’s just a rough outline of what to do.[/quote]

kk ill try

and heres my pickup so can u edit so i can add ids not to be spawned

if(command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 0){
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sM(“Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100”);
}
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pickup help **********$$****
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

if(ItemID == *DonorItemID*){ deleteItem(*ItemID*) sM("You can't spawn this item"); }

The text between the two *'s are what can’t be spawned, and that’s just a rough outline of what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pickup help **********$$****
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Fox0wnage, post:2, topic:327888”]Hmm maybe you make it like this:
if (command.startsWith("pickup") { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { if(ItemID == *DonorItemID*){ deleteItem(*ItemID*) sM("You can't spawn this item"); }
Something like that maybe.[/quote]

wouldnt you need to add item ids somewhere that you cant spawn not just donor items?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pickup help **********$$****
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hmm maybe you make it like this:
if (command.startsWith("pickup") { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { if(ItemID == *DonorItemID*){ deleteItem(*ItemID*) sM("You can't spawn this item"); }
Something like that maybe.

Read full topic
